title: Bug
body: I just bought 3 greater attack speed glyph and it reduced my ip but i cant find it in my rune page..... please help, and please help fix the bug on my ip i still have 900 but i cant buy a 410 rune {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Are you still having trouble seeing your new glyphs after restarting your client? Additionally, this can also update your IP balance display.

Let me know, thanks!
Yep. :( what do you think i should do with it? , Ived already repaired and still the same outcome... Restarting wont work too

I took a peek at your account and I'm able to see the glyphs there. Since you're still having issues with this, I recommend reaching out to our accounts team, who can work with you one-on-one to resolve this for you. You can do so by [submitting a support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
